    serialize

  • Method Details

    • isLastLap

      boolean isLastLap()
      Returns whether the game is in the endgame phase.
      Returns:
      true if the game is in endgame, false otherwise.

    • isGameOver

      boolean isGameOver()
      Checks whether the game has ended or turns can still be played.
      Returns:
      true if the game has ended, false otherwise.

    • nextTurn

      void nextTurn()
      Progresses the turn (if possible) moving to the next player.
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - when trying to move to the next turn when game has ended.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      IPlayer getCurrentPlayer()
      Get the current player playing the turn.
      Returns:
      the player playing the turn.

    • getPlayersInOrder

      List<IPlayer> getPlayersInOrder()
      Get the list of players in the order in which they play their turn.
      Returns:
      the list of players ordered by turn.
